name: Abandoned Void
description:
Nicole wakes up in a strange and dark place. Totally confused, and with nothing but a flashlight, she will do whatever it takes to escape from there. But beware, she is not alone.... there is a creature that will not let her go so easily.

Abandoned Void is an erotic horror game developed in Unreal Engine by a single person from remote Chile. It's a short but intense game that will give you a taste:

  • Nicole; a beautiful girl that you will love.
  • Third and first person gameplay (as you like).
  • Unlock 6 exclusive outfits (the first one is the default outfit).
  • Unlock 12 unique endings depending on the suit you wear (6 good endings, and 6 bad endings).
  • Test yourself and play in two difficulties; normal and hard.
  • Find the riddle pages, answer correctly and escape from that terrifying place.
